Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and exceed your expectations. This exceptional item is valued at $199 by us, reflecting its high quality and unique features. Considering its worth and the benefits it provides, I am extending this exclusive opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $175. Don't miss out on this chance to experience the superior performance and convenience of our product. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you're ready to make this investment in enhancing your experience. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $175. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $175
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
